name: com.castsoftware.springdata
title: Spring Data Framework
description: This extension provides support for Spring Data. It handles the JPA repository APIs and JDBC APIs used in the code. It creates the link between the method calling the JPA and JDBC APIs to the database. It handles the QueryDsl part also. It forms link between the method using querydsl to the involved JPA entity. Spring JDBC JdbcTemplate and NamedParameterJdbcTemplate APIs are also handled, as they are used to populate the databases
